import React from 'react' import './style.scss' const Card = ({dataItem, setDataBook, setShow}) => { const onClickCard = () =>{ setDataBook(dataItem) setShow(true) } const {categories, title, authors} = dataItem?.volumeInfo; const {thumbnail} = dataItem?.volumeInfo?.imageLinks return (

{categories || 'no'}

{title}

{authors}

) } export default Card
